lead_paragraph: WIESEL--Elie. The 92nd Street Y Board, staff and community mourn the passing of Elie Wiesel, one of the world's most important humanitarian voices and an unwavering champion for memory and justice. For almost half a century, Elie Wiesel graced us with his teachings. We could not be more honored to have been his students. We offer our deepest condolences to his beloved wife Marion and his entire family. May they be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. 1/3
